class.rdfs:comment: The price for the delivery of an offer using a particular delivery method.
class.rdfs:label: DeliveryChargeSpecification

schema:appliesToDeliveryMethod.rdfs:comment: The delivery method(s) to which the delivery charge or payment charge specification applies.
schema:appliesToDeliveryMethod.rdfs:label: appliesToDeliveryMethod

schema:areaServed.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
schema:areaServed.rdfs:label: areaServed

schema:eligibleRegion.rdfs:comment:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.

See also ineligibleRegion.
schema:eligibleRegion.rdfs:label: eligibleRegion

schema:ineligibleRegion.rdfs:comment:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is not valid, e.g. a region where the transaction is not allowed.

See also eligibleRegion.
schema:ineligibleRegion.rdfs:label: ineligibleRegion
